appName: Baseball Home Run : Hit & Pitch Fitness
displayName: Baseball Home Run : Hit & Pitch Fitness
display_name: Baseball Home Run : Hit & Pitch Fitness
display_long_description:
Step up to the plate in Baseball Home Run VR, the ultimate VR baseball game made for Meta Quest 2 & 3. Feel the roar of the crowd, the crack of the bat, and the rush of hitting the perfect home run in this immersive baseball VR simulator built for players of all skill levels.

Swing your bat with intuitive motion controls and experience realistic baseball physics as every pitch, curveball, and hit reacts just like in real baseball. Train your timing, power, and precision as you master VR batting mechanics across stunning 3D stadiums that make you feel like a true baseball pro.

Choose your challenge:
• Home Run Derby Mode – Crush homeruns and dominate the baseball VR leaderboards.
• Batting Practice Mode – Sharpen your swing mechanics and timing in realistic training sessions.
• High Score Challenge Mode – Test your focus, power, and endurance to climb the VR baseball rankings.

Designed exclusively for Meta Quest 2 & 3, this standalone sports VR experience delivers smooth gameplay, no cables, and pure baseball action. Whether you’re a casual player or a dedicated baseball fan, you’ll feel the thrill of America’s favorite sport—anytime, anywhere.

Perfect your swing, hit it out of the park, and become the ultimate VR baseball champion. This is more than a game—it’s the future of baseball training, home run competition, and VR sports excitement on Meta Quest.
 Play for fitness, play for fun, and play to be the best. Are you ready to become the home run champion?
